about_the_game:
Land of Futures is simply a village-building game. When you start the game, you choose one of three different races (elf, orc, human) and begin constructing your village with structures unique to that race. You defend your village against nightly orc attacks. You can strengthen your defense with defense towers and walls, and increase your village's population with new houses. Additionally, with a wide range of decorations, you can adorn the village as you wish and build the village of your dreams.
The most significant feature of Land of Futures is that all NPCs in the game have text-based artificial intelligence language support. You can chat with all NPCs in the game at any time just like chatting with a normal medieval villager. Due to experimenting with new technology, you may encounter various limitations and errors in your conversations. Additionally, this feature requires an internet connection to function. We would like to point out that you can only talk to artificial intelligence. You cannot make NPCs take various actions.
